notebook: Lateral reading: is the act of evaluating the credibility of a source by comparing it with other sources.
Cross-referencing involves comparing information from the original source with information from other sources.
Source evaluation: Look to see if someone else has already fact-checked the claim. Go to the original source to understand the trustworthiness of the information.
Time Lines: Truth is always changing. Consider the publication date and whether the information is up-to-date and relevant now.
Dr. Green is using these two potions - Infinity, Blue color, A25, used in beauty products; Lifespring, Pink color, A21, for aiding sleep.
Dr. Green is staying here with his daughter for sabbatical. His daughter's birthday is on 09/05. It seems there is something wrong with his daughter though...
I think I know what happened. Alina may have insomnia, and Dr. Green developed the cure.
The villagers left after I showed them the report, but there is one person still here. Maybe I should talk to the lady with pink hair.

clueList.clueInfo: A pink-haired lady is standing here, and she seems to want to talk to me.

clueDetail.Who&nbsp;are&nbsp;you?: Hello, I am White, a journalist. I am looking for Dr.Green. Do you know where he is?
clueDetail.Why&nbsp;are&nbsp;you&nbsp;looking&nbsp;: He said he would give me some information to publish about the immortality rumor. But I see you have got the reports yourself. I doubt Dr. Green will give it to you, so tell me where he is! Did you hurt him? (She seems very angry)
clueDetail.Do&nbsp;you&nbsp;know&nbsp;who&nbsp;I&nb: (She looks at me very strangely.) I see. (She calmed down.) Can you do me a favor? And I will tell you everything I know.
clueDetail.What&nbsp;is&nbsp;it?: Apart from the report, I want to do another pitch about how this rumor got spreaded like this. What is behind all those people who believe and spread the misinformation? Can you help talking with villagers, and get back to me their stories?

hint: The villagers left after I showed them the report, but there is one person still here. Maybe I should talk to the pink-haired lady.
